techmeme.title: Studies suggest AI chatbots' sycophantic design may increase narcissism among young and vulnerable users, potentially altering personality traits at scale (Derek Thompson)
OpenAI introduces "Auto", "Fast", and "Thinking" settings for GPT-5 in ChatGPT's model picker, with "Auto" similar to the GPT-5 model router announced earlier (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
Singapore's three neobanks, GXS Bank, MariBank, and Trust Bank, together posted $278.1M in losses in 2024 as legacy rivals digitalized, intensifying competition (Dylan Loh/Nikkei Asia)
A senior US official says the recent hack of the US federal court filing system is a continuation of "rudimentary security issues" persisting since 2020 (John Sakellariadis/Politico)
Mumbai-based online pharmacy Truemeds, which offers generic alternatives to branded drugs, raised $85M led by Accel at a $400M valuation, up from $110M in 2023 (Jagmeet Singh/TechCrunch)
